specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Bonded Bonded fabric is created by fusing two different layers into one, which improves durability. When a winter outer layer is combined with a warm lining, it enhances insulation while also supporting a structured, defined silhouette.
specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Performance Breathable Fabric that allows air to pass through easily, helping to keep the wearer cool and comfortable. Quick Dry Quick dry is a technical fabric that wicks away sweat and moisture, helping to maintain a cool and fresh feeling. 4 Way Stretch A 4-way stretch fabric stretches and recovers both width and lengthwise, allowing it to move naturally with the body and return to its original shape. This provides a comfortable, flexible fit, making it especially suitable for activewear. Sustainability Certification > GRS The Global Recycled Standard is a voluntary product standard for tracking and verifying the content of recycled materials in a final product. The standard applies to the full supply chain and addresses traceability, environmental principles, social requirements, chemical content and labeling. Certification > OEKO-TEXÂ® Oeko-Tex is a registered trade mark, representing the product labels and company certifications issued and other services. Certification > GOTS The Global Organic Textile Standard is the worldwide leading textile processing standard for organic fibers. This certification provides credible assurance of responsible manufacturing with the least chemical inputs. Recommended Use Activewear, Swimwear, Leggings
